english_query: Show all employees who work in the 'Sales' department.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'Sales';

english_query: List all orders made in 2021.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM orders WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM order_date) = 2021;

english_query: Find the total number of customers.
sql_query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customers;

english_query: What is the average order amount?
sql_query: SELECT AVG(total_amount) FROM orders;

english_query: List all products that have 'laptop' in their name.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM products WHERE name ILIKE '%laptop%';

english_query: Show all orders made by customer ID 4.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 4;

english_query: Find all employees who joined before 2020.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM employees WHERE join_date < '2020-01-01';

english_query: What is the total sales amount by each employee?
sql_query: SELECT employee_id, SUM(total_amount) FROM orders GROUP BY employee_id;

english_query: List all customers who made an order last month.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM orders WHERE order_date > CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 month');

english_query: List the top 5 most expensive products.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;

english_query: Insert a new employee into the employees table.
sql_query: INSERT INTO employees (name, join_date, department) VALUES ('John Doe', '2023-01-15', 'Engineering');

english_query: Update the department of employee ID 2 to 'Marketing'.
sql_query: UPDATE employees SET department = 'Marketing' WHERE employee_id = 2;

english_query: Delete the customer with ID 10.
sql_query: DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 10;

english_query: Show the total number of orders and the average total amount.
sql_query: SELECT COUNT(*), AVG(total_amount) FROM orders;

english_query: Show the employee name and total sales amount for each employee.
sql_query: SELECT employees.name, SUM(orders.total_amount) FROM employees JOIN orders ON employees.employee_id = orders.employee_id GROUP BY employees.name;

english_query: Find all employees who work in the 'HR' department and joined after 2021.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR' AND join_date > '2021-01-01';

english_query: List all customers who have placed more than 5 orders.
sql_query: SELECT customers.name FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id GROUP BY customers.name HAVING COUNT(orders.order_id) > 5;

english_query: Show the name of the product with the highest price.
sql_query: SELECT name FROM products ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 1;

english_query: Find all employees whose name starts with 'A'.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM employees WHERE name LIKE 'A%';

english_query: What is the sum of all order amounts placed by customer ID 7?
sql_query: SELECT SUM(total_amount) FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 7;
